field.label: Content width
field.comment: Specify value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix. Width can be set between 1000 - 3000px. Default paddings will be added to the content width.

field.label: Transparent Header on Home Page
field.comment: Available only on skins Olivia and Charlotte

field.label: Sticky header opacity
field.comment: Set Sticky Header Opacity in percentages (1-100)

field.label: Display logo on sticky header
field.comment: If the navigation menu has many top categories, other elements will have lack of space.

field.label: Display navigation on sticky header
field.comment: If the navigation menu has many top categories, other elements will have lack of space.

field.label: Display search on sticky header
field.comment: If the navigation menu has many top categories, other elements will have lack of space.

field.label: Logo status
field.comment: Disable it to use default logo

field.label: Small Logo status
field.comment: Will be used in sticky header.

field.label: Number of columns in grid view
Product Name
field.comment: Enable or disable Product Name

field.label: Rating Stars
field.comment: Enable or disable Rating Stars

field.label: Ratings Customer link
field.comment: Enable or disable Ratings Customer link

field.label: "Add your review" link
field.comment: Enable or disable "Add your review" link

field.label: Product Price
field.comment: Enable or disable Product Price

field.label: Button "Add to cart"
field.comment: Enable or disable Button "Add to cart"

field.label: Button "Quickview"
field.comment: Enable or disable Button "Quickview"

field.label: Button "Compare products"
field.comment: Enable or disable Button "Compare products"

field.label: Button "Wishlist"
field.comment: Enable or disable Button "Wishlist"

field.label: Product Name Alignment
field.comment: Product names will be aligned relatively product images

field.label: Price countdown:
field.comment: Activate Price Countdown Timer. Make sure that sale date is set in field "Special Price From Date" on product edit page in section Prices.

field.label: Timer on listing status
field.comment: Timer will be disaplyed on category page

field.label: Timer on listing display options
field.comment: Choose if you want to show full format or just hours, minutes and seconds on listing page

field.label: Timer on product status
field.comment: Timer will be disaplyed on product page

field.label: Timer on product display options
field.comment: Choose if you want to show full format or just hours, minutes and seconds on product page

field.label: Status
field.comment: To use hover effect for a product set a label for needed image as "hover".

field.label: Effect Type
field.comment: Choose effect for appearing hover images

field.label: Google Maps API
field.comment: Please enter API Key. More information: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

field.label: Latitude
field.comment: Please enter Latitude

field.label: Longitude
field.comment: Please enter Longitude

field.label: Map Zoom
field.comment: Please specify map zoom

field.label: Map Type
field.comment: Please specify map type

field.label: Marker
field.comment: Enable or Disable Marker

field.label: Details block status
field.comment: Will show block with detailed information over the Google map

field.label: Static Block for Details
field.comment: Please specify static block name

field.label: Details Block Width
field.comment: Please specify block width in pixels

field.label: Details Block Width
field.comment: Please specify block height in pixels

field.label: Details Block Position
field.comment: Please set one of four available details block position over the Gmap

field.label: Status
field.comment: Enable or Disable Popup Content

field.label: Popup expires end
field.comment: Set period in days after which popup will be shown again if customer has already subscribed or chosen option "Don't show this popup again". Set from 1 to infinite.

field.label: Show only on the homepage
field.comment: If set yes, popup will be shown only on home page.

field.label: Popup width
field.comment: Set width in pixels. min:535

field.label: Popup height
field.comment: Set height in pixels. min:385

field.label: Popup for Mobile:
field.comment: Popup for Mobile:

field.label: Facebook Page URL
field.comment: The URL of the Facebook Page to like

field.label: Height
field.comment: The pixel height of the plugin

field.label: Adaptive WIdth
field.comment: Show posts from the Page's timeline

field.label: Site elements borders color
field.comment: Table borders, dividers in product lists, title and buttons dividers, home blocks border

field.label: Button Type 1
field.comment:
Sidebar: Recently Ordered - View all, Compare Products - Compare, Clear all, Wishlist - Go to Wishlist
Account: Add to Cart, Update Wishlist, Share Whishlist, Add all to cart, Add new Adress
General: Submit form, Save
Checkout: Next, New Address, Apply discount
Login: Create Account, Login

field.label: Button Type 2
field.comment: Cart Update cart, Clear Shopping Cart

field.label: Button Type 3
field.comment: Sidebar: Recently Ordered - Add to Cart

field.label: Product info slider buttons text color
Product info slider buttons border color
Subscribe block background
field.comment: If block has background image, this option will overwrite it. If you want to see the image, set transparent color. For example: rgba(0,0,0,0)

field.label: Header Bottom Background
field.comment: Available on skin Sophia and Ava

field.label: Header border color
field.comment: Available on all pages except Home Page

field.label: Cart dropdown View cart button background color
Cart dropdown View cart button text color
Mobile menu toggle button color (Mobile devices only)
Megamenu Top Category
field.comment: Available in such menu types: Wide submenu, fixed, Vertical and Horizontal tabs

field.comment: Available in such menu types: Wide submenu, fixed, Vertical and Horizontal tabs
